title: Famous Grouse
author: Famous Grouse
content: Do you know that even in the bull market, people don't know how to make money?

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: Quote from: Famous Grouse on November 07, 2022, 07:14:52 PMDo you know that even in the bull market, people don't know how to make money? I do, for those who keep worrying to deal with the risk and they will always be sitting in front of their monitor than do nothing and only seeing the price to go up even higher than before. This is just an old thing for sure but making money in the crypto will always make you deal with the risk. The volatility was the biggest problem here but it can't be avoided as it was making crypto can be very profitable once you have bought that at the bottom price and then you will able to see your assets at the highest price. Making money is not easy as you can't get trapped by buying at the peak price anytime and so, there would always be a reason why some people are only watching the market to go up without taking the advantage. They feel so damn bad to use their money to buy the tokens and take profit.

comments.author: KennyR
comments.created_time: November 07, 2022, 11:49:53 PMLast edit: November 08, 2022, 12:05:12 AM by KennyR
comments.body: We can't expect everyone to be the same in money making. Whether it is bull market or bear market, it is our learning and the experience that helps us with making money. Some used to experience luck out of the market, and the same doesn't happen all the time. People have got different perspective over the cryptomarket which too a reason why users weren't able to do it.

comments.author: Jody.Drummer
comments.body: Quote from: KennyR on November 07, 2022, 11:49:53 PMWe can't expect everyone to be the same in money making. Whether it is bull market or bear market, it is our learning and the experience that helps us with making money. Some used to experience luck out of the market, and the same doesn't happen all the time. People have got different perspective over the cryptomarket which too a reason why users weren't able to do it.You are right that experience is what makes us survive, because experience gives us a very valuable lesson which, in my opinion, experience will not be found in any book. Don't be afraid to try, because how can we learn from experience if we don't try and feel something that no one else can. The bear market and bull market are equally profitable if we understand what we should do with the market conditions in such circumstances. I think everyone can advance because of their experience, from there their knowledge will increase and they will be able to see which opportunities are good in order to make a profit.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: I don't think so. It depends on when you enter the market because, at the start when everything is booming, it's easy to make money because of the price rise. But when you are at the top already, people will only be able to make money if the late entry is on time. It's about time that people start to understand that it's hard to time the market, so much so that it will be challenging to recover what you have lost. That's why some people don't come back to crypto anymore because they were hurt.

comments.author: glendall
comments.body: Quote from: Famous Grouse on November 07, 2022, 07:14:52 PMDo you know that even in the bull market, people don't know how to make money? only greed can not take advantage of the bull market, if people who feel enough will enjoy and make money from the bull market

comments.author: Lorokan
comments.body: Quote from: Famous Grouse on November 07, 2022, 07:14:52 PMDo you know that even in the bull market, people don't know how to make money? haha, i think you are mixing it up. You cannot survive the world if you do not know how to make money. The question is, do you know how to make more money ? This is where trading psychology comes into play. To know how to make more money; you must find answers to this simple questionsWhen do you buy a crypto tokenwhy do you buy a crypto tokenhow do you determine your entryhow do you determine when to take profitswhats the profit cap you would chooseBefore investing at all, you must find answers

comments.author: ultrloa
comments.body: Quote from: Famous Grouse on November 07, 2022, 07:14:52 PMDo you know that even in the bull market, people don't know how to make money? Yes there are some people who doesn't know how to create money on bull market situation because some of them think that they can grow more their money invested on some coins but sudden turn of events which cause them losing since the dump is coming then still they hope for great come back on it. People should realize in this situation that once you are in profit you should learn to exit because market is unpredictable so you need to think you already have enough and closing to get your profit in a day is right thing to do. There are so many chance for us to repeat this and only good timing is what we needed to wait.

comments.author: michellee
comments.body: Quote from: Famous Grouse on November 07, 2022, 07:14:52 PMDo you know that even in the bull market, people don't know how to make money? It's normal that people also don't know how to make money when the market is in a bear market. Those who are afraid to try to analyze market movements will not want to enter the market but only ask when the market will return to a bull market position. They also won't be able to make money because they don't understand when they can start buying. These people will regret it once they find out that the bear market is over and the price has started to increase. And only know that the market is in a bull market when they see the price is already at its peak.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: There are exceptions. But those who are always looking for the perfect opportunity to make money are the mostly struggling ones to achieve their goals, because they wait too long to act, and once they decide acting, it's already too late and the opportunity is over. A classic example are the investors who think bitcoin's price is too expensive, and once a new bull run starts and bitcoin skyrockets they start complaining they should have bought earlier, when it was cheaper. Since the bull run is already happening, they can't afford buying anymore, so they have to wait for the next chance, what may take a new cycle of few years again, meaning they lost time and money.

comments.author: CryptoYar
comments.body: Quote from: Famous Grouse on November 07, 2022, 07:14:52 PMDo you know that even in the bull market, people don't know how to make money? Making money in a bear market is difficult. ( but it is the best time for new investments as you/we can buy coins at a discounted price.)And making money in the bull market is easy. Because in the bull market every project keeps getting pumped. But people do not withdraw their money, rather they keep rotating their money from one project to another. Then they get stuck when the bear market comes.

comments.author: kamvreto
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoYar on November 09, 2022, 05:39:49 PMQuote from: Famous Grouse on November 07, 2022, 07:14:52 PMDo you know that even in the bull market, people don't know how to make money? Making money in a bear market is difficult. ( but it is the best time for new investments as you/we can buy coins at a discounted price.)and today is the awaited discount price, buy some and hold until bullish. a bear market like this is indeed a scary thing for those who buy above, but if they can manage the money of course they have money reserves to do buybacks.Quote from: CryptoYar on November 09, 2022, 05:39:49 PMEveryone knows how to make money, but some don't know how to make profits.And making money in the bull market is easy. Because in the bull market every project keeps getting pumped. But people do not withdraw their money, instead they keep rotating their money from one project to another. Then they get stuck when the bear market comes. Bull markets are highly anticipated, and those who continue to be lucky to rotate their money until they continue to make profits, will be trapped when the market corrects again. there needs to be an awareness that profits must be taken and held in fiat assets or stablecoins to maintain their profits. constantly rotating will not be good if there is no complete control.

comments.author: drwhobox
comments.body: Quote from: Famous Grouse on November 07, 2022, 07:14:52 PMDo you know that even in the bull market, people don't know how to make money? Are you saying it is easier to make money in Bull market? Investors or long term holders who bought coins in bearish market make money in Bull market. Actually I find it pretty easy to make money from bearish market, buy the deep and sell the peak.

comments.author: drwhobox
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoYar on November 09, 2022, 05:39:49 PMQuote from: Famous Grouse on November 07, 2022, 07:14:52 PMDo you know that even in the bull market, people don't know how to make money? Making money in a bear market is difficult. ( but it is the best time for new investments as you/we can buy coins at a discounted price.)And making money in the bull market is easy. Because in the bull market every project keeps getting pumped. But people do not withdraw their money, rather they keep rotating their money from one project to another. Then they get stuck when the bear market comes. What if a new guy comes and buy the peak and the market went down?   I know some of these unlucky people or newbie who buys the peak and the market went down instantly, they loss the patience of holding and sold them on discount.

comments.author: albon
comments.body: Quote from: Famous Grouse on November 07, 2022, 07:14:52 PMDo you know that even in the bull market, people don't know how to make money? I agree with you, but this is often due to the fact that they are beginners and have limited experience and it is due to their choice of memes or shit coins or because of their greed that they want more profits. Undoubtedly, the Bull Market is an opportunity through which we can compensate for the losses of our investment if we buy and hold promising coins until then Time, and patience is the key to success during a bear market and greed is what causes us to lose and miss out on good opportunities even if these opportunities are available to us.

comments.author: dunfida
comments.body: Quote from: KennyR on November 07, 2022, 11:49:53 PMWe can't expect everyone to be the same in money making. Whether it is bull market or bear market, it is our learning and the experience that helps us with making money. Some used to experience luck out of the market, and the same doesn't happen all the time. People have got different perspective over the cryptomarket which too a reason why users weren't able to do it.Yes, we do have our own ways and considering that we do have our own minds and wills which decisions would be made would be totally different to each other this is why we cant really tell on how people would be acting on such condition.Just let them be because they would eventually learn for themselves on what are the sensible things that should be done whether on a bear or bull market.We do share up on the same target or goal on this crypto space and thats why we are here.Each person does have their own  decisions and preferences on certain type of conditions and its none of our business on how they would be handling out themselves.Its better to mind off your own business.

comments.author: sulendra12
comments.body: Quote from: Famous Grouse on November 07, 2022, 07:14:52 PMDo you know that even in the bull market, people don't know how to make money? During bull run people just keep holding their coins until the top of the price possible, but the problem is they are simply don't know how to stop. They reach the impossible and sometimes they miss the opportunity to sell the  best price possible during that bull market, it's usually happens when the market having a massive surge of price in just matter of days. Planning is important during that days, you can't just simply hold it and pray for the best, you need to do something.

comments.author: lalabotax
comments.body: Quote from: Famous Grouse on November 07, 2022, 07:14:52 PMDo you know that even in the bull market, people don't know how to make money? This has been common for some people, hasn't it?People who have not enough knowledge or ability about the crypto industry may be still confused about what to do maximally to make money in the crypto business. Although some of them have understood, in fact, not all of them are able to make money or make more money even during the bearish or bullish market. There may be several reasons:- They really don't know the ways because of the lack of knowledge, less learning- They are too late to sell their assets at a good price, expecting to sell them at a higher price again, but in fact, the rice keeps dropping- Lack of management of funds so that we may not really know what should do with our assets. - Doing trading which is this is actually very risky moreover without enough knowledge, in fact, they make some loss instead of profits.

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: Quote from: Famous Grouse on November 07, 2022, 07:14:52 PMDo you know that even in the bull market, people don't know how to make money? Even in this bearish season, some people are still making money because thy have good strategy and are financially intelligent. Logically, every individual who can be patient till it completely becomes bullish will benefit, but those who have the best strategy and possess good financial intelligence will make the most money.

comments.author: abel1337
comments.body: Quote from: Bananington on November 09, 2022, 09:32:16 PMQuote from: Famous Grouse on November 07, 2022, 07:14:52 PMDo you know that even in the bull market, people don't know how to make money? Even in this bearish season, some people are still making money because thy have good strategy and are financially intelligent. Logically, every individual who can be patient till it completely becomes bullish will benefit, but those who have the best strategy and possess good financial intelligence will make the most money. I believe that if you are a spot trader, You will chase bounces from massive dumps to gain a good amount of profit though people are now making money on futures trading which they short the crypto they want. The risk of futures trading is a bit high but on our current situation, I personally choose it as a way to earn money. I usually don't use futures on a normal market day but shorting massive dumps is very profitable, We just need to be careful since liquidation is very common on this type of scenario.
